works.name: Fenrir Inc.
works.description: Mainly around Android and Xamarin, I have developed applications such as iOS / Unity. Besides, I used  Golang, Python, Perl a bit.  I got the qualification of Xamarin Certified Mobile Developer when I was in this company. In addition, I was doing new employee training.

works.name: CyberAgent Inc.
works.description: I develop android application of blog service using Kotlin, Java and I am a leader of the android team with seven engineers. Mainly used libraries is Databinding, Architecture Components, Dagger2, RxJava2, Retrofit, Glide, Groupie, Mockito, Truth etc.
